title: Cy and Medusa
subtle:
Fantasy (fiction), 532 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 550L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and O
description: Young Cy and Medusa find an unlikely friendship when they discover that they share similar hardships at school. Cy and Medusa is a story about how these mythical creatures help solve the other's problem and learn how to adapt to what makes each of them unique. The book can also be used to teach students how to retell and identify characters, setting, and plot. The book and lesson are also available for levels I and O.
